title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Choice-Based Microlearning Courses for Personalized Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select three language topics relevant to their job roles and independently design learning content
Learners can utilize 15 language expressions required in workplace situations through customized task performance
Learners achieve a satisfaction score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in language learning based on personalized learning experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
